params.forwarderTemplate: It implements all the payment and execution needs, it pays for the deployment during initialization, and it pays for the transaction execution on each execute() call.

params.index: - Allows to create many addresses for the same owner|recoverer
params.owner: - EOA of the owner of the smart wallet
params.recoverer: - Address of that can be used by some contracts to give specific roles to the caller (e.g, a recoverer)
